response.original_title: BBC Battle of Britain The South Coast Trail
response.overview: Military historian Howard Tuck travels along the south coast uncovering forgotten traces of one of the most terrifying planned invasions of Britain. Howard knocks on doors and takes metal detectors into the countryside to unearth untold stories of bravery, tragedy and guilt lain buried for 70 years.
response.title: BBC Battle of Britain The South Coast Trail
